name: Main Cast - Lucky Star
description:
Now features more characters!!!! :D
I mostly use MeinaMix V8 for this LoRA, but other models may work aswell.
Euler a and 7 CFG works fine. Nanako is a little weird. Prompts like "= =" or ":3" or "^ ^" work for faces.

RECOMMENDED CHARACTER PROMPTS:

Akira Kogami: (kogami akira, 1girl, solo, pantyhose, sleeves past fingers, sleeves past wrists, oversized clothes, pink hair, ahoge, yellow eyes, short hair, skirt, :3, long sleeves)

Konata Izumi: (izumi konata, 1girl, solo, ryouou school uniform, school uniform, long hair, mole, mole under eye, yellow bowtie, serafuku, bow, bowtie, green eyes, yellow bow, blue hair, ahoge, short sleeves, sailor collar)

Kagami Hiiragi: (hiiragi kagami:1.2), 1girl, solo, ryouou school uniform, school uniform, serafuku, long hair, twintails, purple hair, neckerchief, blue eyes, skirt, socks, red neckerchief, tsurime, pleated skirt, shoes, white socks

Minami Iwasaki: (iwasaki minami, 1girl, solo, pantyhose, expressionless, ryouou school uniform, school uniform, neckerchief, serafuku, pink neckerchief, green hair, blue eyes, short hair, skirt, red neckerchief)

Misao Kusakabe: (kusakabe misao, 1girl, ryouou school uniform, school uniform, solo, serafuku, short hair, brown hair, neckerchief, red neckerchief)

Takara Miyuki: (takara miyuki, 1girl, school uniform, glasses, solo, neckerchief, serafuku, ryouou school uniform, pink hair, long hair, purple eyes, red neckerchief, skirt, sailor collar)

Nanako Kuroi: (nanako kuroi, 1girl, solo, blonde hair, green eyes, fang, long hair, ponytail, jacket, formal)

Tsukasa Hiiragi: (hiiragi tsukasa, 1girl, solo, school uniform, ryouou school uniform, serafuku, short hair, purple hair, yellow hairband, ribbon)

Yutaka Kobayakawa: (kobayakawa yutaka, 1girl, solo, school uniform, ryouou school uniform, serafuku, neckerchief, red hair, sleeves past wrists, red neckerchief, twintails, blush, sleeves past fingers)
